Sloan Digital Sky Survey¶

This module provides access to data from the Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS).

Data Release Module Name Data Type Publication
Sako 2014 sdss.sako14 Photometric Sako et al. (2014)

Sako 2014¶

This module provides access to data from the SDSS-II SN Catalog Data Release, published in Sako et al. 2014.

data_is_available() Return whether data has been downloaded for this survey / data release
delete_module_data() Delete any data for the current survey / data release
download_module_data() Download data for the current survey / data release
get_available_ids() Return a list of target object ids for the current survey
get_available_tables() Get numbers of available tables for this survey / data release
get_data_for_id(obj_id) Returns data for a given object id
iter_data([verbose, format_sncosmo]) Iterate through all available targets and yield data tables
load_table(table_num) Load a table from the data release paper
register_filters() Register filters for this survey / data release with SNCosmo
SNData.sdss.sako14.data_is_available()[source]¶

Return whether data has been downloaded for this survey / data release

Returns
A boolean
SNData.sdss.sako14.delete_module_data()[source]¶

Delete any data for the current survey / data release

SNData.sdss.sako14.download_module_data()[source]¶

Download data for the current survey / data release

SNData.sdss.sako14.get_available_ids()[source]¶

Return a list of target object ids for the current survey

Returns:A list of object ids as strings
SNData.sdss.sako14.get_available_tables()[source]¶

Get numbers of available tables for this survey / data release

SNData.sdss.sako14.get_data_for_id(obj_id)[source]¶

Returns data for a given object id

See get_available_ids() for a list of available id values.

Parameters:obj_id (str) – The ID of the desired object
Returns:An astropy table of data for the given ID
SNData.sdss.sako14.iter_data(verbose=False, format_sncosmo=False)[source]¶

Iterate through all available targets and yield data tables

An optional progress bar can be formatted by passing a dictionary of tqdm arguments. Skips any empty tables.

Parameters:
  • verbose (bool, dict) – Optionally display progress bar while iterating
  • format_sncosmo (bool) – Format data for use with SNCosmo (Default: False)
Yields:

Astropy tables
SNData.sdss.sako14.load_table(table_num)[source]¶

Load a table from the data release paper

SNData.sdss.sako14.register_filters()[source]¶

Register filters for this survey / data release with SNCosmo
